001.comments: This program focuses on German in the Workplace. The Program's objective is to familiarize students with the current terminology used in the context of the workplace in German speaking countries and to facilitate and understand important professional themes like branches of industry and their products, presenting a business idea, planning and preparing a fair, understanding and resolving conflict situations at the workplace, etc; Prerequisite: GERM 210

description: Review of the most important grammatical patterns in application to business geography, import-export trade, marketing, finance, accounting, taxation, workplace conditions and requirements; oral and written forms of presentation for work with German business.
